experiences.title: System Analyst

experiences.description: Analyzing business requirements and designing technical solutions. Leading system architecture decisions and ensuring alignment with business objectives.

projects.title: Report Website analysis and development
projects.description: Analyzed and developed a report website to streamline data reporting processes. Implemented user-friendly interfaces and optimized performance for large datasets.

projects.title: Pick & Put System

projects.title: Form Submission System
projects.description: Developed a web-based form submission system to streamline data collection processes. Implemented validation and reporting features.

experiences.title: Website Developer
